property.name: Race
property.value: Oracle Celes

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature or at the start of your turn, if your opponent has more cards in their hand than you have in yours, draw a card. If that opponent has more cards in their mana zone than you have in yours, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone face down. ■ Each of your Unknown creatures in your hand get "Crystal Soul 2" and your Zenith creatures in your hand get "Crystal Soul 3". ■ Once per turn, when this creature would leave, you may turn 2 face down cards in your mana zone face up instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {CRYSTAL SOUL} 3 (While you are summoning this creature, the mana number of face down cards in your mana zone becomes 3.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature, each opponent chooses 2 of their creatures and 2 cards from their hand and shieldifies them. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, each opponent chooses one of their shields and puts it into their graveyard. {ETERNAL KAPPA} (When this creature would leave, you may turn 3 face down cards in your mana zone face up instead.)

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may summon a Zenith creature that costs 18 or less from among them for no cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Choose one of your Zenith creatures and one of your opponent's creatures. Those creatures battle. Then destroy the creature you put this way. TWINPACT ■ Reveal the top card of your deck. If its an Oracle, Unknown or Zenith, put it into your hand. {CRYSTAL CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone face down instead of your graveyard.)

property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever you put another Oracle, Unknown or Zenith, you may draw a card. ■ Crystal Arms 2: If you have 2 or more face down cards in your mana zone, this creature gets "escape". (When a creature that has "escape" would be destroyed, you may add one of your shields to your hand instead. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.)

property.value: {NINJA STRIKE} 4 (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and if during that attack you didn't use a "Ninja Strike" ability, you may summon this Shinobi for no cost. At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) ■ When you put this creature, one of your creatures gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn.
